description.value:
This operation determines, for a given patient, the latest stop per medicamenteuze behandeling (MBH) based on MedicationAgreement (MedicatieAfspraak), AdministrationAgreement (ToedieningsAfspraak) and MedicationRequest resources representing a WisselendDoseerSchema (WDS) in the source system.
When invoked in the context of a specific kind of building block (e.g. MedicationAgreement, AdministrationAgreement or VariableDosingRegimen/WDS), the server SHALL return the active and latest stopped building blocks of that kind for each pharmaceutical treatment (MBH). The server MAY use all three kinds internally to determine the state per MBH.
If requested (e.g. via the include-details parameter), the server MAY also return the underlying MedicationAgreement, AdministrationAgreement and WDS resources that were used to determine the latest stop per MBH.

purpose.value: To provide a deterministic, server-side application of the 'latest stop per MBH' rule in the MedicationProcess, so that clients can obtain a consistent view of stopped and ongoing medication without having to reimplement stop logic themselves.

documentation.value: Patient for whom the latest stop per MBH should be determined. The reference SHALL point to a Patient resource that is resolvable on the server.
Optional restriction to one or more specific medicamenteuze behandelingen (MBH). If omitted, the server SHALL determine the latest stop for all MBHs in the source system for the given patient.

If true, the returned Bundle SHOULD include not only the resulting Medication resources after applying the latest stop logic, but also the underlying MedicationAgreement (MedicatieAfspraak), AdministrationAgreement (ToedieningsAfspraak) and WDS MedicationRequest resources that define the last stop per MBH (typically using additional Bundle.entry or _include-style semantics).

Bundle containing the results after applying the latest stop logic per MBH for the given patient (and optional filters).
When the operation is invoked in the context of a specific kind (e.g. on MedicationRequest, MedicationAgreement or AdministrationAgreement, or via a search where only one kind is being queried), the Bundle SHALL at least contain the building blocks of that kind that are active or represent the latest stop per MBH, including latest stopped building blocks of that kind even if their PeriodOfUse lies outside the searched period.
If the include-details parameter is true, the Bundle MAY additionally contain other related resources (for example the underlying MedicationAgreement, AdministrationAgreement and WDS MedicationRequest resources used to determine the latest stop).
